name: David Sove
text: Ignore the 1 star reviews, there's a new owner and good god did he turn this place around. The old staff were awful, wouldn't pick up the phones, pizza was poorly made before. With the new crew/owner, this is quite literally the best pizza I've ever had from a Little Caesars. Keep up the good work, you've earned yourselves a regular.

name: marion lambeth
text: I got a deep dish pizza and it was made fresh. Based on the reviews I decided to try it before I left. I thought it tasted pretty good. Aside from the phone not being answered and the overall cleanliness of the store (should have been much â€¦More

name: Michael Bruschuk
text: We ordered 16 pizzas today for a party. Great customer service. They generously added in a few extra orders of breadsticks, pizza, & sauces. Thanks for being reliable VPLC!

name: Dylan Burgett
text: We had planned to buy a bunch of pizzas there last Saturday for my daughter's birthday party.  They were supposed to open at 11:00am, but weren't answering there phone.  I drove over there at 11:30, and while there were people inside making â€¦More

name: Carol Kolb
text: Good basic pizzas. Good prices. Fast and clean.  Owers work there themselves so its clean and efficient.

name: Brittany Horton
text: I went there TONIGHT!!! And the lady forgot to give me my crazy/dipping marinara sauce. I didnâ€™t realize it until I got home. So I called and the guy that worked tonight could not speak English! I told him what my order was and what I was â€¦More

name: Ramin Ghanbari
text: They are putting the classic 5 dollars hot n ready in the extra most best box. So obvious. I called them out on it. They denied it. Then I drive to the Lombard location and ordered one there. It looked like twice the toppings compared to the store in Villa Park, confirming my suspicion. Calling corporate tomorrow.

name: Pete Bussert
text:
This specific establishment has changed Management and entire staff 3 times in as many years...
Thus far, each has struggled to provide even the basic of customer service.
BUT, you won't find a better $5 Pizza. So, you take the bad with the inexpensive...

name: Nadia Pack
text: Orange Sign on door says "Voluntary closing due to no food Permit". Another paper sign says its closed.

name: Mars Cubed
text: Why can't you call this store? A number is given online but rings once then disconnects.

name: Don Busby
text: Wow! I haven't eaten at Little Caesars  in years. Service was great, food was cooked right and served hot and fast,  but it tasted AWFUL. It was the first time I ever threw half a pizza away. Bad food!

name: Eddie Jones
text: Got three pizzas and I just bit into plastic, will be dropping off the plastic to the store when I get back into town. Went back and was given $20 so I'm out $6 and some change. The place is dirty and English is not spoken well there and â€¦More

name: Bill Ridder
text: I went to get a pizza at 6:30 pm, door was open, 4 people working, I tried to order... I was informed that they are closed. No explanation, apology, just pointed at the door and said "we're closed." I'm used to waiting for unreasonable amounts of time here, but to be refused is a little ridiculous.

name: Camille Thomas
text: The worse. Service was extremely slow. The young man at the register had a very snazzy little attitude. He insisted on telling me...how "I" wanted my food prepared...after I very clearly told him otherwise. Crazy breed was undercooked and doughy due to that fact. The whole experience was just a waste of time.

name: GLYTCH da RIP
text: Looks like they're closed. Might be permit situation ðŸ¤·

name: Oz Hull
text: Great attitude from the staff, and they always make my custom order perfect

name: Michael Jacobs
text: It's Little Caesars they're all pretty similar. The staff has been better recently.

name: princesaalisa
text: love this place, have always had a good experience. they're really busy so yes when you have 15 people walk in at once after someone just walked out with 10 pizzas, you might have to wait... logical. thanks for your amazing fresh food always!

name: Head Martian
text: Horrible service ðŸ˜¢ didn't have my order ready even though it was 30 minutes after pickup time their always out of everything and don't have good workers I love little Cesars but this one sucks

name: Bobby Smith
text: Went there yesterday at 5pm, was told that the friends of the employee working (whom he had been speaking with for several minutes before acknowledging me), had just bought the last of the hot and ready pizzas (they appeared to be holding â€¦More

text: Unhonest! Clean and fast.

name: Dan
text: Good prices and good portions. I usually get cheese pizzas here and it's often quite cool right when they hand it over. â€¦More

name: Irish Goodbye
text: Like others have said, $5 pizza now shoved in the $6 box to inflate prices. They also have the balls to put a tip bucket on the counter, are you kidding me?!?

text: You think you know what youâ€™re gonna get but donâ€™t. I got the lunch special I was not good had a Funny taste maybe it had been sitting there a while

text: I went their at 5pm today and they said they were preparing my food when the one girl was just back thier and the guy was on the phone taking a order. They said that the crazy combos were fresh when it was the hardest piece of bread I have ever had. Thier were black things on the crazy combos

name: Blair Hoy
text: Best value for pizza period.

name: Leaf M
text: Delicious, hot, tasty, and convenient!  This is a great place to get cheap pizza when you're craving it!!

name: T.J. Ellixir

text: Understaffed at 6pm with only 2 people working. Younger guy with sunglasses was polite. Both were complaining that 5 people are ordering food at the same time because that's busy to them apparently. Bigger guy with tattoos being rude to his â€¦More

name: Chris Holo
text: It's garbage food sitting in a heat box for hours on end, but you get what you pay for.  I'd take two jumbo slices at Billy's Pizza Dugout over a $5 Hot&Ready anyday.  I think it's funny that some of these reviews are bitching that they got a fresh pizza.  Lol do you also want the oldest hotdog at the gas station?? Hahah

name: diplomatic4
text: Horrible, food is over seasoned, and you have a bunch of kids working and they reek of marijuana, not worth it just stay away from here theres one a roosevelt road thats better managed.

text: The girl at the front counter has no respect for the customer. Not sure what her title is but she needs  an attitude adjustment. Her name I think is Amber. Worst Little Cesar experience I have ever  had.........
